description: The function is vulnerable to Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information (CWE-319) as it does not enforce encryption for all communications. This could allow an attacker to intercept and read sensitive data. Additionally, the function is vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption (CWE-400) as it does not limit the size of the buffers array. This could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a large amount of data and filling up the server's memory.
